text: 21 INDEX MANAGEMENT Primary key indexes point to version chain head. — How often the DBMS has to update the pkey index depends on whether the system creates new versions when a tuple is updated. — If a txn updates a tuple’s pkey attribute(s), then this is treated as an DELETE followed by an INSERT.
